title: Chocolate Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°. Whisk flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt. Beat butter and sugar until fluffy. Add eggs and vanilla. Gradually add flour mixture. Stir in chocolate chips if using. Drop by rounded tablespoons onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes until edges are set. Cool on pan 2 minutes before transferring to wire rack.
